channel.title: >:( for the last time, Can not loggin to server
channel.description: Ok, this is probably the last time i will say this question on this website, butt... My friend has made a server (i did most of the work) and i am the actual owner, but i can't login. My friend has told me that 200 people went on the server yesterday, and now i wanna join the fun as the owner. I am the owner of the No-Ip adress, i use the client my friend uses, and I am using Windows Vista home preneim 32bit, (i know thats bad). Please help a fellow out guys, if u have a solution, Shoot it at me! and yeas my friend uses a router, and he has port-forwarded, i've tried port-forwarding too, but is it nessesary? i will talk when i come back from school.

item.title: >:( for the last time, Can not loggin to server
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

First is his server even on? lol if not then it wont work, and it wouldnt be a reason to try lol.

Read full topic

item.title: >:( for the last time, Can not loggin to server
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“zane02, post:5, topic:302240”]First of all lets get this straight mandood, you are NOT the actual owner on the server. Only the server owner is the actual owner of the server, because he has all the control of the files & he is hosting the server. Its his choice who is ban, unban, muted, unmuted, mod, admin, co-owner, owner. He does all that so technically no one has “owner” but him lol.

Anyway back on topic…

1.) You should connect to the ip address he gives to you, so you can connect.
2.) I recommend you make your own server lol which is way more rewarding for you.
3.) And finally i recommend you try using the client he gives you that he says connects straight to his ip so you can login.[/quote] I’m finally back from school, now ummm yeah, iv’e made my own server before but recently, i got a router, so now i have no idea on portforwarding and stuff, but i do know how to make a server! I might use teamviewer on my friends computer to see what he sees and stuffs. and yeass i use the client he uses, and do you mean enter his ip adress in to server ip thing?

Read full topic
item.source: >:( for the last time, Can not loggin to server

item.title: >:( for the last time, Can not loggin to server
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

First of all lets get this straight mandood, you are NOT the actual owner on the server. Only the server owner is the actual owner of the server, because he has all the control of the files & he is hosting the server. Its his choice who is ban, unban, muted, unmuted, mod, admin, co-owner, owner. He does all that so technically no one has “owner” but him lol.

Anyway back on topic…

1.) You should connect to the ip address he gives to you, so you can connect.
2.) I recommend you make your own server lol which is way more rewarding for you.
3.) And finally i recommend you try using the client he gives you that he says connects straight to his ip so you can login.

Read full topic
